original_title: Pompeii: Life and Death in a Roman Town
overview: The volcanic eruption that ravaged Pompeii in year 79 is one of the most famous in history. It is known how its victims died, but how did they live? A new insight into the lives of the people who lived in the shadow of Mount Vesuvius before its cataclysmic eruption.
title: Pompeii: Life and Death in a Roman Town
